items.name: .NET MAUI
items.title: .NET MAUI
items.description: .NET Multi-platform App UI (MAUI) is a framework for building native user interfaces for mobile, desktop, and web applications using a single codebase. It is an evolution of the Xamarin.Forms framework, and it allows developers to create applications that run on multiple platforms with a consistent user experience.

items.name: .NET Standard
items.title: .NET Standard
items.description: .NET Standard is a specification for .NET APIs that ensures compatibility across different .NET implementations, such as .NET Framework, .NET Core, and Xamarin. It provides a common set of APIs that can be used in any .NET application, regardless of the runtime or platform.

items.name: Accessibility
items.title: Accessibility
items.description: Software design and developed to allow people with disabilities to use them. This can be tools, technologies, techniques. We want to continue learn about accessibility and maintain updated, we recognize the importance of make accessible apps.

items.name: ADO
items.title: ADO
items.description: Azure DevOps, a cloud-based service for managing the entire application lifecycle.
